## Figure S3 code

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

# get Figure S3
final_plot = ggplot2::ggplot() + ggplot2::annotation_custom(
  grid::rasterGrob(
    magick::image_read("data/p02-09/Figure_S3.png"),
    width = ggplot2::unit(1, "npc"),
    height = ggplot2::unit(1, "npc")),
  -Inf, Inf, -Inf, Inf)

```
